allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Resolve hardening: timeouts + cache + structured logs

- All network fetches use consistent 10s AbortController timeouts
- In-memory cache with 6-hour TTL, keyed by inputUrl
- Structured JSON logging with:
  - ts: ISO timestamp
  - success: boolean \(replaces ok\)
  - cached: boolean flag for cache hits
  - strategy: resolution method used
  - methodsTried: array of attempted methods
  - durationMs: request timing
  - inputHost/publisherHost: hostnames
  - error: null on success, string on failure

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(__NEW_LINE_e8aba1de2d107640__ git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: gate reader debug output behind ?debug=1 query param

- Remove debug URL display from appearing in production
- Add debug prop to ReaderView component
- Only show debug info when ?debug=1 is in the URL
- Add CSS break-words/break-all to prevent horizontal scroll on long URLs

This fixes horizontal scrolling caused by long Google News URLs
in the reader view debug output.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(__NEW_LINE_972e5de0c8f7aaf7__ git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
UI: improve spacing in main app view

Part 1 of UI improvements:
- Header: center title with absolute positioning, increase button
  tap targets \(min 44px\), add gap-3 between buttons
- Tabs: add py-3.5 for subtle vertical breathing room
- Last refreshed: increase padding to py-2.5
- Article rows: increase padding to py-4.5 for slightly more space
- Read indicator: increase size to h-2.5/w-2.5, adjust mt-1.5 for
  better vertical centering with title
- Trusted sources page: increase spacing between items \(space-y-3\),
  adjust item padding \(px-4 py-3.5\), increase header margin \(mb-3\)

No behavior changes. No API modifications.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(__NEW_LINE_3920cf87d2c9d8b8__ git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF'' UI: improve reader view spacing and paragraph rendering Part 2 & 3 of UI improvements: Reader view spacing: - Separate source line and date/time into distinct visual blocks - Add mb-4 after title, mb-2 after source line - Adjust margins around divider and debug block - Slightly increase Open Original button padding \(py-2.5\) Paragraph rendering \(render-layer only\): - If article.body contains double newlines \(\\n\\n\), split into paragraphs and render each as

with mb-4 spacing - Trim whitespace and filter empty paragraphs - Fall back to single block with improved line-height \(leading-7\) when no paragraph breaks exist - Does NOT use heuristics or NLP - only explicit \\n\\n breaks No behavior changes. No API modifications. Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 EOF \)")

Bash(__NEW_LINE_4d230b9a87ad2349__ git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF'' fix: use valid Tailwind spacing + improve paragraph rendering Tailwind spacing fix: - Changed py-4.5 -> py-5 in ArticleList.tsx - py-4.5 is NOT a valid Tailwind default spacing value \(only 4 and 5 exist\) - Other .5 values \(py-3.5, py-2.5, p-2.5\) ARE valid in Tailwind''s default scale This is why the article row spacing wasn''t taking effect on iPhone PWA. Paragraph rendering improvements: - Normalize Windows newlines \(\\r\\n -> \\n\) before processing - If body contains \\n\\n: split on double newlines, render as

with mb-4 - Else if body contains \\n: split on single newlines, render each line as

with mb-4 for breathing room - Else: single block with leading-7 This handles more article body formats and provides visual paragraph breaks even when articles only have single newlines between lines. Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 EOF \)")

Bash(__NEW_LINE_00d416c12516de40__ git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
UI: double spacing throughout for more breathable layout

Roughly doubled padding/margins across all views for a noticeably
more open, less cramped experience on both mobile and desktop.

HomeClient.tsx:
- Header: py-3 -> py-4 sm:py-5, button gap-3 -> gap-4
- Buttons: p-2.5 -> p-3, min size 44px -> 48px
- Tabs: py-3.5 -> py-4 sm:py-5, text-sm -> text-base

ArticleList.tsx:
- Last refreshed: py-2.5 -> py-4 sm:py-5
- Article rows: py-5 -> py-6 sm:py-7
- Row layout: items-start -> items-center for better alignment
- Read indicator: h-2.5 w-2.5 -> h-3 w-3, centered with flex
- Dividers: border-border -> border-zinc-200/60 dark:border-zinc-800/60
- Add to trusted button: text-xs -> text-sm, pb-3 -> pb-4

sources/page.tsx:
- Header: py-3 -> py-4 sm:py-5, back button min-h 44px -> 48px
- Content: px-4 py-6 -> px-5 sm:px-6 py-6 sm:py-8
- List items: space-y-3 -> space-y-5
- Item padding: px-4 py-3.5 -> px-5 sm:px-6 py-5 sm:py-6
- Button tap targets: all min-h-[48px]

ReaderView.tsx:
- Header: py-3 -> py-4 sm:py-5, back button min-h 44px -> 48px
- Article padding: px-4 py-6 -> px-4 sm:px-6 py-6 sm:py-8
- Title: mb-4 -> mb-6, text-2xl -> text-2xl sm:text-3xl
- Source line: mb-2 -> mb-3, text-sm -> text-sm sm:text-base
- Divider & button spacing: mb-5/mb-6 -> mb-6/mb-8
- Open Original: py-2.5 -> py-3.5, min-h-[48px]
- Paragraph rendering: mb-4 -> mb-5, leading-relaxed -> leading-8
- Text size: text-base -> text-base sm:text-lg
- Sentence-splitting heuristic for bodies with no newlines:
  Split on /\(?<=[.!?]\)\\s+\(?=[A-Z]\)/ and group 3 sentences per paragraph

All Tailwind classes verified as valid.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
